titles.title: Tax and Education Assistance for Children (TEACH) Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against tax for qualified elementary and secondary education tuition.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/17/2012--Introduced. Tax and Education Assistance for Children (TEACH) Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers a credit for the tuition expenses they incur in having their dependents attend a private or religious elementary or secondary school.
